content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (22.5, -7.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at Position (22.5, -7.5)
- Boiler at Position (20.5, -4.0)
- Offshore Pump at Position (19.5, -1.5)
- Pipe network connecting these entities
- Small Electric Poles at various positions for electricity distribution

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-11.0, 20.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at Position (-11.5, 18.5) for iron ore collection
- Stone Furnaces at Positions (0.0, 0.0) and (2.0, 0.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates

### Copper Cable Factory at Position (10.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling Machine at Position (10.5, 0.5) for producing copper cables
- Inserter at Position (9.5, 5.5) to supply copper plates to the assembling machine
- BeltGroup connecting the furnace at Position (5.0, 5.0) to the Assembling Machine at Position (10.5, 0.5)

### Storage and Transfer System
Consists of:
- Wooden Chests at Positions (-3.5, 0.5) and (-3.5, 2.5) for storing items
- Inserters at Positions (-3.5, 1.5) and (9.5, 5.5) for transferring items between entities
- Transport Belts at various positions for item movement

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Extracting Items
- Ensure the entity contains the item you want to extract before attempting extraction. For example, verify that the assembling machine contains copper cables before extracting.

### Assembling Machine Not Producing
- Ensure that the assembling machine is receiving power and has the necessary ingredients to produce the desired item. Check connections and power supply to the assembling machine.

### Errors when Using Inserters without Power
- Ensure inserters are connected to a power source and receiving electricity to function properly. Check the status of nearby electric poles and connections.

### Boiler Out of Fuel
- Regularly check and refuel boilers to maintain continuous operation. Ensure a steady supply of fuel to avoid interruptions.

### Steam Engine Not Receiving Input Liquid
- Verify that the steam engine is properly connected to the boiler and receiving steam. Check the pipe connections and ensure there is no blockage or disconnection.
